abilities.name: Source.
abilities.description: tales from the yawning portal,  page 238

abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: Kalka-Kylla can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: False Appearance.
abilities.description: While Kalka-Kylla remains motionless and hidden in its shell, it is indistinguishable from a polished boulder.

abilities.name: Shell.
abilities.description: Kalka-Kylla can use a bonus action to retract into or emerge from its shell. While retracted, Kalka-Kylla gains a +4 bonus to AC, and it has a speed of 0 and can't benefit from bonuses to speed.
